rules_text:
When Risti Inquisitor enters the battlefield, choose one –
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Put a +1/+1 counter on Risti Inquisitor.
flavor_text: [i]Once, the Parliament ruled Lovi with a gentle hand. Now, that hand grasps and crushes tight, desperate to hold on.[/i]
notes:
CWCgenericCMC2

Once, the Parliament wielded lethal force only against ‘enemies of the state'. Now, its definition of ‘enemy of the state' becomes looser with each incident.
